author: woonsan
msg: JS2-1063: Reverting jetspeed-proxy module and its configurations because the module has been moved to apa-webcontent. (See APA-16).
Also, replaces an example portlet fragment with IFramePortlet in default-page.psml by new ReverseProxyIFramePortlet.

author: tvolkert
msg: Set svn:eol-style on newly added files

author: woonsan
msg: APA-16: Adding out-of-box reverse proxy service component.
- Makes it fully configurable on http client, connection manager, proxy path url mappings and rewriter configurations.
- Enhances performance by following the performance guidelines of httpclient.
- Uses Portlet 2.0 head contribution feature to add auto-resizing javascript just once.
- Adds out-of-box reverse proxy servlet with example configurations for www.apache.org and portals.apache.org
